entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along exposed areas of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
